name: Nabbed
_source: speak;Hogarth;Son, you won't continue this tomfoolery. Come here!
speak;Hogarth;How dare you do this to me?!|You short sighted simpleton, you know nothing!
speak;Nabin;I don't want to hurt you...
speak;Hogarth;You're already dead to me, so I needn't care about your life.
speak;Hogarth;Prepare yourself.|If you think so low of me, show me how poor of a father I was.
speak;Leap;Nabin...|We'll have to leave you... as you said...|But it hurts to be so cruel...
